article.description: Victor Joseph scored 19 points, Kyle Toth added 17 and Cal Poly beat Texas A&M-Corpus Christi 82-70 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Cal Poly pulls away early to beat Texas A&M-Corpus Christi
article.linkText: Cal Poly pulls away early to beat Texas A&M-Corpus Christi
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. -- Victor Joseph scored 19 points, Kyle Toth added 17 and Cal Poly beat Texas A&M-Corpus Christi 82-70 on Saturday night. Joseph was 6 of 11 from the field and made four 3-pointers. Toth made five 3-pointers and a pair of free throws. Luke Meikle added 13 points and Donovan Fields had 12 for the Mustangs (5-4), who shot 28 of 50 for 56 percent shooting from the floor. Rashawn Thomas scored 24 points to lead the Islanders (5-1). Amin Ehab added 18 points and Cole Martinez finished with 10 points. The Mustangs had a 21-point halftime lead. Martinez made a 3-pointer to pull the Islanders to 58-52 with 9:43 left, but they didn't get closer. Cal Poly plays its next five games on the road before opening Big West Conference play at UC Davis on Jan. 7. The Islanders visit Texas A&M on Monday.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
